title: SJB Protest March to reach Danowita today (28)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The ‘Struggle for Freedom’ rally organized by the Samagi Jana Balawegaya entered its 3rd day, today.
The Freedom Struggle organized by the SJB commenced from Galigamuwa this morning.
The rally that began in Kandy on Tuesday is set to reach Colombo in two days.
ICRC to donate medical supplies to Sri Lanka through the Sri Lanka Red Cross
Economic Centers closed in support of nation wide Trade Union action; Vegetables left unattended
